Name: Element Extractor
Description: A reagent used by material processors to extract elemental particles from element crystals rich in Engram.
Description$english: A reagent used by material processors to extract elemental particles from element crystals rich in Engram.
Description2$english: Able to temporarily alter the structure of elemental crystal fragments, making them easier to process. There is usually no need to worry about the loss of elemental properties during processing, as each elemental unit is absolutely enclosed and self-sufficient, theoretically possessing infinite divisibility.
